activities.name: Happy Hollow Zoo
activities.description: A 16-acre zoo and amusement park with rides and animals specifically designed for young children.
activities.tips: Visit early in the day to avoid crowds. The petting zoo is perfect for toddlers.

activities.name: Palo Alto Junior Museum & Zoo
activities.description: A small museum and zoo with interactive science exhibits and over 50 species of animals.
activities.tips: The museum is designed with toddlers in mind, with plenty of hands-on exhibits.

activities.name: Seven Seas Park
activities.description: A family-friendly park with nautical-themed playground equipment and plenty of green space.
activities.tips: The play structures are separated by age group, making it easy to find age-appropriate areas.

activities.name: Old Fremont Preserve Hiking
activities.description: Scenic hiking trails through grasslands and oak woodlands with views of the Bay Area.
activities.tips: The Toddler Trail is perfect for young children. Bring plenty of water and sun protection.

activities.name: Villa Montalvo Hiking
activities.description: Beautiful gardens and hiking trails on the grounds of a historic villa.
activities.tips: The garden paths are perfect for young children. The villa occasionally hosts family-friendly events.

activities.name: Stanford Shopping Center
activities.description: Upscale outdoor shopping mall with gardens, play areas, and family-friendly dining.
activities.address: 660 Stanford Shopping Center, Palo Alto, CA 94304
activities.tips: The children's play area is perfect for short breaks while shopping. Many restaurants offer kid-friendly options.

activities.name: CuriOdyssey
activities.description: Science and wildlife center with animal exhibits and interactive science experiments.
activities.address: 1651 Coyote Point Dr, San Mateo, CA 94401
activities.tips: Check the schedule for animal feeding times, which are fascinating for young children.

activities.name: Children's Discovery Museum of San Jose
activities.description: Interactive children's museum with hands-on exhibits covering art, science, and more.
activities.tips: The Wonder Cabinet area is designed specifically for children under 4. Bring a change of clothes for the water play area.

activities.name: Emma Prusch Farm Park
activities.description: Urban farm park with fruit orchards, a small animal farm, and playgrounds.
activities.address: 647 S King Rd, San Jose, CA 95116
activities.tips: The animal area is perfect for toddlers, with friendly goats and other farm animals.

activities.name: Baylands Nature Preserve
activities.description: Wetlands preserve with boardwalks, bird watching, and easy walking trails.
activities.tips: Great for bird watching. The boardwalk trails are stroller-friendly and perfect for toddlers to explore.

activities.name: Raging Waters San Jose
activities.description: Large water park with slides, wave pools, and kids' areas - perfect for summer fun.
activities.address: 2333 S White Rd, San Jose, CA 95148
activities.tips: The 'Little Dipper' area is perfect for toddlers. Go early to get good spots for your belongings.

activities.name: Story Time at Sunnyvale Library
activities.description: Weekly interactive story time session for toddlers and young children.
activities.tips: Arrive a bit early to get a good spot. Sessions include songs and movement activities perfect for toddlers.
